blogPost.excerpt: appfleet is an edge compute platform that allows people to deploy their web applications globally. Instead of running your code in a single centralized location you can now run it everywhere, at the same time. Get better performance, latency and uptime!
blogPost.body: appfleet is an edge compute platform that allows people to deploy their web applications globally. Instead of running your code in a single centralized location you can now run it everywhere, at the same time. Get better performance, latency and uptime!
blogPost.title: appfleet - Edge compute for containerized services & deploy global apps
blogPost.author: Dmitriy A.

localize.description: appfleet是一个边缘计算平台，允许人们在全球范围内部署他们的网络应用。您现在可以在任何地方同时运行您的代码，而不是在单一的集中位置运行。获得更好的性能、延迟和正常运行时间!
localize.tagline: 用于容器化服务和部署全局应用的边缘计算。

localize.description: appfleet是一個邊緣計算平臺，允許人們在全球範圍內部署他們的網絡應用。您現在可以在任何地方同時運行您的代碼，而不是在單一的集中位置運行。獲得更好的性能、延遲和正常運行時間!
localize.tagline: 用於容器化服務和部署全局應用的邊緣計算。

previous.excerpt: Share your remote story! We are excited to introduce RemoteRated, a focused place to rate and review the remote competence, benefits, and tools of companies. Like Glassdoor, for our new remote world.
previous.title: RemoteRated - Glassdoor for a remote world

localize.description: 分享您的远程故事 我们很高兴地介绍RemoteRated，这是一个专注于评价和审查公司远程能力、福利和工具的地方。像Glassdoor一样，为我们的新远程世界服务。
分享您的遠程故事 我們很高興地介紹RemoteRated，這是一個專注於評價和審查公司遠程能力、福利和工具的地方。像Glassdoor一樣，爲我們的新遠程世界服務。

next.excerpt: Supersourcing helps both startups & enterprises find the right tech partners faster than ever before. The decade-old process of outsourcing is boring, expensive and often risky. Supersourcing is 100% pure delight. Trusted by founders from YC, Harvard & MIT.
next.title: Supersourcing - Discover & hire the right tech partner for your business

localize.description: 超级外包帮助初创公司和企业比以往任何时候都更快地找到合适的技术合作伙伴。十年前的外包过程是枯燥的、昂贵的，而且往往是有风险的。而Supersourcing则是100%的纯粹乐趣。受到来自YC、哈佛和MIT的创始人的信任。
localize.tagline: 为您的企业发现和雇佣合适的技术合作伙伴。

localize.description: 超級外包幫助初創公司和企業比以往任何時候都更快地找到合適的技術合作夥伴。十年前的外包過程是枯燥的、昂貴的，而且往往是有風險的。而Supersourcing則是100%的純粹樂趣。受到來自YC、哈佛和MIT的創始人的信任。
localize.tagline: 爲您的企業發現和僱傭合適的技術合作夥伴。
